channel.title: [DELTA] help random DC and rollbacks
channel.description:
Uhm.. its hard to explain but sometimes when my players are on and someone tries to log out, or will randomly happen sometimes. Players will start disconnecting and rolling back to the last time they logged in. Is there a way to add auto-saves every five minutes orso. OR if players DC it auto saves their account. Or a way to even stop DCs in general. I will screenshot the error messages in the server next time it happens.
Also sometimes my server goes into a "dc frenzy" and will lag out and dc players for like 2 minutes
also i already tried googeling it, i searched up "delta rsps auto save" "delta rsps random dc" "delta rsps random rollbacks" and so much more... i was trying to avoid postin for help so i dont get any "try google" crap...
If you need me to provide any files, or the code lines of certain files let me know. [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/307yatd.jpg[/img]
if it helps, hosting server off a windows vista using java 6 to compile and run

item.title: [DELTA] help random DC and rollbacks
item.dc:creator: @PseudoCode PseudoCode
item.description:
@PseudoCode wrote:

A cheap fix would to add a timer in process and check every X minutes

Use this code as an example. It’s Pseudo Code and won’t work with your code unless you have the proper variables and methods.

if(saveTimer == 0) {
savegame(true); //replace with your save method
saveTimer = 150000; // reset the timer
}

if(saveTimer >= 150000)
saveTimer–;

Read full topic

item.title: [DELTA] help random DC and rollbacks
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

zip your server files, upload it and send me a link. I will try and find the error.

Make sure to include only the .java files, i won’t need any of your saves or .dat information.

Read full topic
